descr: Component to manage a running INSECA system

userdata-skey-pub-file.descr: Public key used to verify the signature of USERDATA resources

allowed-virtualized.descr: CSV list of allowed virtualization execution environment

allow-network-connections.descr: True if the network stack (managed by NetworkManager) is enabled

disable-inseca-services.descr: List of INSECA's network services to disable
